title: Contemporary Stay Near Bangkok with Outdoor Pool & Onsite Dining
description:
Discover a stylish urban retreat characterised by contemporary design and Thai hospitality in northern Bangkok. Take a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool, and when hunger strikes, choose authentic Brazilian specialties at Pedro Churrascaria & Steakhouse or Italian favourites at Alberto's Pizzeria & Trattoria.

Shop to your heart's content with direct access to a retail paradise, catch an adrenaline-pumping Muay Thai match at nearby Rangsit Stadium, or explore the impressive Wat Dhammakaya temple complex. Novotel Bangkok Future Park Rangsit is the ideal location to escape the capital's hustle and bustle.
offer_address: 114 Paholyothin Road, Prachathipat, Thanyaburi District, Pathum Thani 12130, Thailand
